entry.source: Oh, my poor baby... {F804,5}{F873,1}{F804,0} has left my{F801}side, and now he is missing. I know he's{F801}been struggling with a lot recently...{F801}How can I ever apologize to him? I've heard{F801}that he's in Shinjuku at the moment. Please,{F801}convince him to come home. I don't care how!{F801}
